caption.p: Functional evaluation of the immune system cells. In (a) we have the results of interleukin-6 secretion, in (b) the secretion of interleukin-10, in (c) the production of tumor necrosis factor alpha, and in (d) the production of nitric oxide (NO). Data expressed as mean Â± standard deviation and it was performed at each test triplicate (n=3). In each graph the different letters represent a statistically significant difference at p <0.05.
